name: Attach And Match
description:
Use the mouse to spin the wheel

The goal is to match 4 of the same colors (though it don't always work as it's supposed to). If an attached sphere hits the borders, the game ends. If you want to, you can post your score in the comments. Good luck! :)

I got help making the music from my 2.5 year old child that I let go nuts on the keyboard and then used samples of the recordings.

Sound effects are downloaded from 'Kenny' (www.kenney.nl).
